sense.name: any device that performs work by using energy
sense.examples: He read a great science fiction story where machines take over the world. They are keeping him alive on a dialysis machine. This machine can perform a billion instructions a second. That Porsche is a sweet driving machine! Can you use a sewing machine? The tiny robotic machines scrub plaque out of human arteries. This back hoe and the other machines on site were built in Japan. He runs a machine tool shop. In that story they used a time machine to travel back to medieval Europe. He wants to know why two machines on the assembly line keep breaking. This is a machine to make pasta.

sense.name: an organization that efficiently performs its goals
sense.examples: They needed to raise more money to feed the war machine. He was endorsed by Chicago's Democratic machine. His publication empire was a tremendous public opinion machine.

sense.name: a person who efficiently performs his/her goals
sense.examples: Each one of those Navy Seals is a lethal fighting machine. The new secretary is an absolute filing machine!

sense.name: a literary device to achieve dramatic effect
sense.examples: The machine of giving the protagonist amnesia is a shop-worn literary device. The plot machines were very predictable in that action film.
